shortDescription: Transform your PlayStation 4 controller into a productivity tool for your Mac. Control your cursor, click, scroll, and execute keyboard shortcuts from a distance.
longDescription:
PS4Controller - Use Your DualShock 4 Controller on Mac

Transform your PlayStation 4 controller into a productivity tool for your Mac. PS4Controller seamlessly connects your DualShock 4 controller and lets you control your cursor, click, scroll, and execute keyboard shortcuts—perfect for navigating your Mac and working from a distance or in comfort.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Mouse Control: Use the right analogue stick to move your cursor with customisable sensitivity
  • Button Mapping: Assign any controller button to mouse clicks (left, right, middle), scrolling, or keyboard commands
  • Keyboard Shortcuts: Map buttons to keyboard combinations with modifier keys (⌘, ⇧, ⌥, ⌃)
  • Real-Time Monitoring: Monitor all controller inputs in real time with the calibration view
  • Menu Bar Integration: Runs quietly in your menu bar, working even when the app isn't frontmost
  • Customisable Settings: Adjust cursor sensitivity and scroll scaling to match your preferences

Ideal for productivity work, presentations, media control, and everyday Mac navigation. While primarily designed for productivity use, the app may also work with games, though gaming performance is not specifically optimised or tested. Works in the background so you can use your controller across all your Mac applications.
